text:
October 1* 1952
Mr. Graydon Ausmus
Vice-President, HAEB
WUQA, University of Alabama
University, Alabama
Dear Graydon:
Checking on Earl Wynn.
Sot being member of committee, don*t know
whether I should comment or not on possible meeting. I
would meet if I had one or more likely candidates. I
would not meet in October without a good one. At this
moment, I consider Wynn of such type. I do not consider
Morris, Peterson, Bro of this type.
Sir, my reply is somewhat late because I was
out of town when your letter arrived (attending another
MARTS meeting, in which U. of I. and TV were mentioned.
Dunn, Abbots, and Wegener are in session with Miles
on the FAE 180,000 project, but X haven*t even seen *em.
Too busy. Having lunch with *em today.
Regards,
FESsfmh
Frank E. Schooley
Treasurer
